20110128220802.000|20110128220804.000|CC1|IS THAT WHERE IT'S ALL          
20110128220804.000|20110128220804.000|CC1|HAPPENING?                      
20110128220804.000|20110128220806.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT CULMINATEED.    
20110128220806.000|20110128220810.000|CC1|I'M RIGHT IN THE CENTER, ALONG  
20110128220810.000|20110128220812.000|CC1|WHERE YOU'RE TALKING ABOUT.     
20110128220812.000|20110128220814.000|CC1|CAIRO IS A LARGE CITY DIVIDE IN 
20110128220814.000|20110128220816.000|CC1|TWO HALVES BY THE NILE RIVER.   
20110128220816.000|20110128220818.000|CC1|AND EARLIER TODAY WHEN THE      
20110128220818.000|20110128220820.000|CC1|PROTESTS BEGAN THEY STARTED OUT 
20110128220820.000|20110128220821.000|CC1|AT MOSQUES THAT WERE SPREAD OUT 
20110128220821.000|20110128220823.000|CC1|ALL OVER THE CITY AND THE IDEA  
20110128220823.000|20110128220826.000|CC1|WAS TO HAVE ALL OF THE          
20110128220826.000|20110128220828.000|CC1|PROTESTERS CONVERGE LIKE SPOKES 
20110128220828.000|20110128220830.000|CC1|IN A BICYCLE WHEEL RIGHT INTO   
20110128220830.000|20110128220831.000|CC1|THE CENTER OF THE CITY.         
20110128220831.000|20110128220834.000|CC1|SO WE SAW A LOT OF VIOLENT      
20110128220834.000|20110128220836.000|CC1|CLASHES IN TAHRIR SQUARE, IN    
20110128220836.000|20110128220837.000|CC1|DOWNTOWN CAIRO.                 
20110128220837.000|20110128220839.000|CC1|BUT AS PEOPLE HAVE BEEN GOING   
20110128220839.000|20110128220840.000|CC1|HOME, THEY HAVE BEEN BRINGING   
20110128220840.000|20110128220842.000|CC1|SOME OF THE PROTESTS BACK TO    
20110128220842.000|20110128220843.000|CC1|THEIR INDIVIDUAL NEIGHBORHOODS, 
20110128220843.000|20110128220846.000|CC1|IN THE OUTSKIRTS OF THE CITY.   
20110128220846.000|20110128220848.000|CC1|THERE HAS BEEN DEMONSTRATIONS IN
20110128220848.000|20110128220849.000|CC1|SUEZ, ALEXANDRIA, THE NILE      
20110128220849.000|20110128220850.000|CC1|DELTA.                          
20110128220850.000|20110128220852.000|CC1|THE BIGGEST CONCENTRATION OF    
20110128220852.000|20110128220853.000|CC1|PEOPLE AND MOST VIOLENT WERE    
20110128220853.000|20110128220855.000|CC1|ONES WERE TODAY IN DOWNTOWN     
20110128220855.000|20110128220855.000|CC1|CAIRO.                          
20110128220855.000|20110128220857.000|CC1|>> YOU KNOW WHEN YOU VISIT      
20110128220857.000|20110128220859.000|CC1|CAIRO, I'VE BEEN THERE A FEW    
20110128220859.000|20110128220900.000|CC1|TIMES, YOU GET A SENSE THERE'S A
20110128220900.000|20110128220902.000|CC1|LOT OF BUREAUCRATS, A LOT OF    
20110128220902.000|20110128220904.000|CC1|PEOPLE WITH MINIMAL STAKE IN    
20110128220904.000|20110128220905.000|CC1|STABILITY, THEY DRESS WESTERN,  
20110128220905.000|20110128220907.000|CC1|THEY HAVE JOBS, THEY TAKE A     
20110128220907.000|20110128220909.000|CC1|BREAK MORE THAN WE DO, PERHAPS

20110128220917.000|20110128220920.000|CC1|POOR OR REVOLUTION OF THE       
20110128220920.000|20110128220921.000|CC1|MIDDLE?                         
20110128220921.000|20110128220924.000|CC1|>> I THINK IT'S OF THE LOWER    
20110128220924.000|20110128220924.000|CC1|MIDDLE.                         
20110128220924.000|20110128220925.000|CC1|IT'S OF THE EXACT WORKING CLASS 
20110128220925.000|20110128220928.000|CC1|PEOPLE THAT YOU WERE TALKING

20110128220928.000|20110128220929.000|CC1|PEOPLE WHO MAYBE WORK IN A      
20110128220929.000|20110128220931.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT OFFICE, IN A POST    
20110128220931.000|20110128220932.000|CC1|OFFICE OR SOMETHING LIKE THAT.  
20110128220932.000|20110128220934.000|CC1|DRIVE A CAB AS A SECOND JOB.    
20110128220934.000|20110128220936.000|CC1|THOSE PEOPLE ARE HAVING A VERY  
20110128220936.000|20110128220938.000|CC1|DIFFICULT TIME IN EGYPT RIGHT   
20110128220938.000|20110128220938.000|CC1|NOW.                            
20110128220938.000|20110128220939.000|CC1|PRICES HAVE GONE UP.            
20110128220939.000|20110128220941.000|CC1|RENTS HAVE GONE UP.             
20110128220941.000|20110128220942.000|CC1|IT'S DIFFICULT FOR YOUNG PEOPLE

20110128221004.000|20110128221005.000|CC1|PEOPLE BASICALLY ON THE TAKE

20110128222139.000|20110128222142.000|CC1|PEOPLE AND I AM ALSO AWARE OF

20110128222235.000|20110128222237.000|CC1|AND KNOCKING DOWN WHAT WE HAVE  
20110128222237.000|20110128222237.000|CC1|BEEN BUILDING.

20110128222240.000|20110128222245.000|CC1|CONVICTIONS THAT WE WILL        
20110128222245.000|20110128222251.000|CC1|CONTINUE OUR POLITICAL, ECONOMIC
20110128222251.000|20110128222254.000|CC1|AND SOCIAL REFORMS FOR A FREE

20110128222256.000|20110128222259.000|CC1|MODERN PRINCIPLES AND OPENING TO
20110128222259.000|20110128222259.000|CC1|THE WORLD.                      
20110128222259.000|20110128222302.000|CC1|I HAVE TAKEN THE SIDE AND WILL  
20110128222302.000|20110128222306.000|CC1|ALWAYS BE TAKING THE SIDE OF THE
20110128222306.000|20110128222310.000|CC1|POOR PEOPLE OF EGYPT.           
20110128222310.000|20110128222312.000|CC1|CONVINCED THAT ECONOMY IS TOO   
20110128222312.000|20110128222314.000|CC1|DANGEROUS TO BE LEFT TO         
20110128222314.000|20110128222316.000|CC1|ECONOMISTS ALONE.               
20110128222316.000|20110128222318.000|CC1|I HAVE ALWAYS BEEN KEY ON       
20110128222318.000|20110128222321.000|CC1|DIRECTING THE GOVERNMENT'S      
20110128222321.000|20110128222323.000|CC1|POLICIES TOWARDS ECONOMIC

20110128222327.000|20110128222329.000|CC1|SPEEDED UP TO LIFT THE SUFFERING
20110128222329.000|20110128222330.000|CC1|OF THE PEOPLE.

20110128222336.000|20110128222338.000|CC1|SERVICES, HEALTH CARE, HOUSING

20110128222343.000|20110128222346.000|CC1|CONDITIONAL ON OUR EFFORTS TO   
20110128222346.000|20110128222349.000|CC1|MAINTAIN EGYPT'S SECURE, STABLE,
20110128222349.000|20110128222355.000|CC1|HOMELAND OF CIVILIZED PEOPLE.   
20110128222355.000|20110128222400.000|CC1|THAT CANNOT JEOPARDIZE ITS      
20110128222400.000|20110128222402.000|CC1|ASPIRATION TO FUTURE OR LEAVE IT
20110128222402.000|20110128222405.000|CC1|TO GO DOWN THE DRAIN.           
20110128222405.000|20110128222411.000|CC1|WE WILL GO ABOUT THE ARSON AND  
20110128222411.000|20110128222413.000|CC1|LOOTING WHICH MAY INDICATE      
20110128222413.000|20110128222415.000|CC1|FURTHER PLOTS TO SHAKE THE      
20110128222415.000|20110128222416.000|CC1|FOUNDATION AND STABILITY OF     
20110128222416.000|20110128222417.000|CC1|EGYPT.                          
20110128222417.000|20110128222421.000|CC1|I CALL ON OUR YOUTH AND CALL ON 
20110128222421.000|20110128222423.000|CC1|EACH AND EVERY EGYPTIAN CITIZEN,
20110128222423.000|20110128222426.000|CC1|MAN AND WOMAN, TO WORK FOR THE  
20110128222426.000|20110128222429.000|CC1|PUBLIC INTERESTS OF THE PEOPLE  
20110128222429.000|20110128222433.000|CC1|AND TO STAND UP FOR THEIR       
20110128222433.000|20110128222436.000|CC1|COUNTRY, NOT BY SETTING ABLAZE, 
20110128222436.000|20110128222437.000|CC1|ASSAULTING PUBLIC AND PRIVATE   
20110128222437.000|20110128222439.000|CC1|PROPERTY, NOT BY THIS WE CAN    
20110128222439.000|20110128222441.000|CC1|ACHIEVE THE ASPIRATIONS OF EGYPT
20110128222441.000|20110128222442.000|CC1|AND ITS PEOPLE.                 
20110128222442.000|20110128222445.000|CC1|YET THESE ASPIRATIONS CAN BE    
20110128222445.000|20110128222446.000|CC1|ACHIEVED FOR A BETTER FUTURE BY 
20110128222446.000|20110128222450.000|CC1|WAY OF AWARENESS, DIALOGUE AND  
20110128222450.000|20110128222452.000|CC1|GENUINE EFFORTS FOR THE PUBLIC  
20110128222452.000|20110128222453.000|CC1|GOOD.                           
20110128222453.000|20110128222459.000|CC1|MY FELLOW CITIZENS, I ADDRESS   
20110128222459.000|20110128222504.000|CC1|YOU TODAY IN NOT ONLY AS THE    
20110128222504.000|20110128222506.000|CC1|PRESIDENT OF THE REPUBLIC BUT AS
20110128222506.000|20110128222508.000|CC1|AN EGYPTIAN CITIZEN WHICH MY    
20110128222508.000|20110128222511.000|CC1|FAITH PUT ME UNDER THE          
20110128222511.000|20110128222513.000|CC1|RESPONSIBILITY OF THIS COUNTRY, 
20110128222513.000|20110128222514.000|CC1|EXHAUSTED MY LIFE FOR THE       
20110128222514.000|20110128222519.000|CC1|COUNTRY IN TIMES OF WAR AND     
20110128222519.000|20110128222520.000|CC1|PEACE.                          
20110128222520.000|20110128222524.000|CC1|WE HAVE WEATHERED HARD TIMES AND
20110128222524.000|20110128222525.000|CC1|SURMOUNTED THESE OBSTACLES WHEN 
20110128222525.000|20110128222530.000|CC1|WE STOOD UP FOR THEM ONE PEOPLE,
20110128222530.000|20110128222532.000|CC1|ONE NATION AND WHEN WE WERE

20110128223514.000|20110128223516.000|CC1|MOWING PEOPLE DOWN IS NOT GOING 
20110128223516.000|20110128223516.000|CC1|HAPPEN.                         
20110128223516.000|20110128223517.000|CC1|>> IN THE MIDDLE EAST WE'VE SEEN
20110128223517.000|20110128223519.000|CC1|AN ALL OR NOTHING SITUATION.    
20110128223519.000|20110128223522.000|CC1|EITHER YOU HAVE THE SHAH WITH

20110128224249.000|20110128224250.000|CC1|SEQUENCE OF EVENTS YOU WATCHED  
20110128224250.000|20110128224254.000|CC1|IN THAT REGION OVER TIME?       
20110128224254.000|20110128224256.000|CC1|>> I LIVED HERE FOR ABOUT FOUR  
20110128224256.000|20110128224258.000|CC1|YEARS AND IN LIVED IN A VERY    
20110128224258.000|20110128224300.000|CC1|POOR AREA, SEVERAL DIFFERENT

20110128224302.000|20110128224303.000|CC1|MUSLIM BROTHERHOOD.             
20110128224303.000|20110128224304.000|CC1|THEY WERE MY NEIGHBORS.         
20110128224304.000|20110128224306.000|CC1|THEY WOULD COME IN AND CHECK ON 
20110128224306.000|20110128224307.000|CC1|ME.                             
20110128224307.000|20110128224308.000|CC1|THEY WERE VERY RELIGIOUS.       
20110128224308.000|20110128224310.000|CC1|ANTI-AMERICAN TO A DEGREE BUT   
20110128224310.000|20110128224312.000|CC1|ACCEPTED ME ON A PERSONAL LEVEL.
20110128224312.000|20110128224314.000|CC1|SODOM BACK HERE NOW AND         
20110128224314.000|20110128224315.000|CC1|OBVIOUSLY I'VE BEEN BACK SINCE  
20110128224315.000|20110128224318.000|CC1|THEN MANY, MANY TIMES.          
20110128224318.000|20110128224319.000|CC1|I WANT IS EXTRAORDINARY TO SEE  
20110128224319.000|20110128224322.000|CC1|THESE EVENTS TAKING PLACE RIGHT 
20110128224322.000|20110128224322.000|CC1|NOW.                            
20110128224322.000|20110128224324.000|CC1|THE RULING PARTY OF MUBARAK HAS 
20110128224324.000|20110128224327.000|CC1|BEEN SEEN AS SO INCREDIBLY      
20110128224327.000|20110128224332.000|CC1|STRONG, SO MONOLITHIC IT COULD  
20110128224332.000|20110128224333.000|CC1|SMOTHER ANY PROBLEMS WITH ITS   
20110128224333.000|20110128224334.000|CC1|OWN BUREAUCRACY.                
20110128224334.000|20110128224335.000|CC1|WHEN I WAS HERE THERE WERE      
20110128224335.000|20110128224336.000|CC1|PROBLEMS WITH LAND REFORMS.     
20110128224336.000|20110128224338.000|CC1|WHAT THE GOVERNMENT DID WAS     
20110128224338.000|20110128224339.000|CC1|ABSORB THE GRIEVANCES.          
20110128224339.000|20110128224341.000|CC1|THEY SAID OKAY IF YOU HAVE A    
20110128224341.000|20110128224342.000|CC1|PROBLEM BRING TO IT THE COURTS. 
20110128224342.000|20110128224344.000|CC1|I WANT SLOWED THE PEOPLE DOWN.  
20110128224344.000|20110128224346.000|CC1|AND PEOPLE WERE NEVER -- DIDN'T 
20110128224346.000|20110128224348.000|CC1|HAVE THE GUTS TO GO OUT AND TAKE
20110128224348.000|20110128224349.000|CC1|TO THE STREETS.                 
20110128224349.000|20110128224351.000|CC1|THIS IS NOT SOMETHING THAT WANT 
20110128224351.000|20110128224352.000|CC1|EGYPTIANS TAKE LIKELY, NOT      
20110128224352.000|20110128224353.000|CC1|SOMETHING THEY DO.              
20110128224353.000|20110128224356.000|CC1|SO FOR THEM TO BE OUT SCREAMING 
20110128224356.000|20110128224358.000|CC1|ANTI-MUBARAK SLOGANS WHICH I'M  
20110128224358.000|20110128224400.000|CC1|HEARING RIGHT NOW IS AN         
20110128224400.000|20110128224401.000|CC1|INCREDIBLE TURN OF EVENTS.      
20110128224401.000|20110128224403.000|CC1|>> WHEN YOU VISIT EGYPT AS I'VE 
20110128224403.000|20110128224405.000|CC1|DONE A COUPLE OF TIMES YOU GET  
20110128224405.000|20110128224407.000|CC1|AND RECENTLY YOU GET A SENSE    
20110128224407.000|20110128224409.000|CC1|IT'S A VERY, A VERY ARRANGED    
20110128224409.000|20110128224411.000|CC1|SOCIETY, WITH EVERYONE KNOWING  
20110128224411.000|20110128224413.000|CC1|THEIR ROLE AND IT'S SOMETHING   
20110128224413.000|20110128224415.000|CC1|YOU CAN PUT ON PAPER.           
20110128224415.000|20110128224418.000|CC1|IT SEEMS LIKE A COMPLIANT       
20110128224418.000|20110128224418.000|CC1|SOCIETY.                        
20110128224418.000|20110128224420.000|CC1|PEOPLE ACCEPT THEIR ROLES,      
20110128224420.000|20110128224421.000|CC1|ACCEPT THEIR STATION.           
20110128224421.000|20110128224423.000|CC1|ACCEPT THE FACT THEY HAVE A     
20110128224423.000|20110128224424.000|CC1|CERTAIN PIECE OF THE SOUP WHERE 
20110128224424.000|20110128224426.000|CC1|THEY CAN DO THEIR BUSINESS AND  
20110128224426.000|20110128224429.000|CC1|THEY KNOW HOW TO GET THEIR FOOD 
20110128224429.000|20110128224432.000|CC1|SOURCES AND SOUVENIRS OPINION   
20110128224432.000|20110128224434.000|CC1|IT'S RICHLY LAYERED SOCIETY.    
20110128224434.000|20110128224436.000|CC1|USED TO WORK TOGETHER AND THESE 
20110128224436.000|20110128224437.000|CC1|ARRANGEMENTS.                   
20110128224437.000|20110128224438.000|CC1|DOES IT SURPRISE YOU THIS CAN   
20110128224438.000|20110128224440.000|CC1|ALL COME APART LIKE THIS IN A   
20110128224440.000|20110128224442.000|CC1|DAY OR TWO?                     
20110128224442.000|20110128224443.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WELL, THE PROBLEM  
20110128224443.000|20110128224445.000|CC1|WAS AND I KNOW EXACTLY THE EGYPT
20110128224445.000|20110128224447.000|CC1|YOU'RE DESCRIBING, IT WAS VERY  
20110128224447.000|20110128224449.000|CC1|MUCH LIKE THAT WHEN I LIVED     
20110128224449.000|20110128224450.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20110128224450.000|20110128224451.000|CC1|THERE WERE MANY PEOPLE WHO WERE 
20110128224451.000|20110128224452.000|CC1|POOR.                           
20110128224452.000|20110128224454.000|CC1|BUT THEY ACCEPTED THEIR LOT IN  
20110128224454.000|20110128224454.000|CC1|LIFE.

20110128224500.000|20110128224501.000|CC1|AND THERE WAS A, ALMOST AN HONOR
20110128224501.000|20110128224503.000|CC1|IN POVERTY.

20110128224504.000|20110128224508.000|CC1|LAST FOUR OR FIVE YEARS,        
20110128224508.000|20110128224510.000|CC1|HOWEVER, IS A REAL EXPLOSION IN 
20110128224510.000|20110128224511.000|CC1|THE GAP BETWEEN THE RICH AND THE
20110128224511.000|20110128224512.000|CC1|POOR.

20110128224513.000|20110128224515.000|CC1|ALWAYS BEEN LIKE THIS BUT GOTTEN

20110128224519.000|20110128224521.000|CC1|SALARY, LIVING NEXT TO

20110128224524.000|20110128224530.000|CC1|ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR, FIVE

20110128225150.000|20110128225155.000|CC1|>> WELL, IT'S VERY UNLIKELY.
